alert.note: Alert for Platte (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 8:46AM CDT until September 23 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Platte County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 930 AM CDT. * At 845 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Monroe, or 15 miles west of Columbus, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Columbus, Duncan, Platte Center, Monroe, Lakeview, Tarnov, College View Trailer Park, Camp Pawnee, Shell Creek Elementary School, Central Community College, Lake Babcock, Lake Ocaonee, Circle H Trailer Park, and Lake North. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
